java.code: package Sorts; import java.util.Arrays; import java.util.List; /** * The common interface of most sorting algorithms * * @author Podshivalov Nikita (https://github.com/nikitap492) */ public interface SortAlgorithm { /** * Main method arrays sorting algorithms * * @param unsorted - an array should be sorted * @return a sorted array */ <T extends Comparable<T>> T[] sort(T[] unsorted); /** * Auxiliary method for algorithms what wanted to work with lists from JCF * * @param unsorted - a list should be sorted * @return a sorted list */ @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") default <T extends Comparable<T>> List<T> sort(List<T> unsorted) { return Arrays.asList(sort(unsorted.toArray((T[]) new Comparable[unsorted.size()]))); } }
